intro: Clusia abbottii, commonly known as the golden trumpet tree, is a tropical evergreen shrub or small tree native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of bright yellow, trumpet-shaped flowers that bloom throughout the year. The plant is known for its ability to thrive in humid, tropical climates and is often found in coastal areas. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for landscaping in warm regions. Clusia abbottii is also valued for its hardiness and adaptability to various soil types.
